channel.title: Have I been sleeping too long? on Blist Multilingual Theme

item.title: American black bear cub in spring, Shenandoah National Park, Virginia (© Scott Suriano/Getty Images)
item.description: 图文来源自：bing. copyright: © Scott Suriano/Getty Images Welcome to the world, bear cub! After spending the first months of its life inside the den, this frizzy American black bear child may be puzzled by the outside world. The cubs are born between January and February, but they don’t leave their den until about mid-April or the beginning of May. When the young bears emerge into spring, they weigh around 2 kilograms and grow to about 35 kilograms by their first birthday.
